Destination:
THE BROADMOOR
settings.text: As summer comes to an end and temperatures start to drop, we can't help but think about spending a long weekend exploring the picturesque setting of The Broadmoor. This iconic Colorado Springs resort is celebrated and admired by generations of families. The attraction of the mountains, streams and canyons gives guests seemingly endless options for activities and relaxation alike. The five star accommodations and culinary options are just the beginning of what The Broadmoor has to offer on your next getaway.

settings.title: The Golden Bee
settings.text: The Broadmoor is home to an authentic 19th century British Pub, right on the property. The pub was brought to The Broadmoor straight from the UK, panel by panel, and made its new home in Colorado Springs. The Golden Bee has been a long-time Broadmoor staple. Loved for its unforgettable Fish & Chips, and unmistakeable cheerful atmosphere, at The Golden Bee you can find guests singing along to the nightly piano. The class pub tunes paired with an extensive selection of the finest ales from English, Irish and local craft breweries and updated menu will have you coming back to the Golden Bee every night.

settings.title: Find Susan Shaw at The Broadmoor
settings.text:
With 23 shops on the property, shopping is an activity in itself at The Broadmoor. Find Susan Shaw in the gift shop! A piece from our Bee Collection is the perfect memento of your stay, a nod to the Golden Bee Pub. 

No matter what activities you indulge in while at the Broadmoor, there is a Susan Shaw piece to elevate your look from the pool, to the mountaintop, all the way to the dining room.  

We are loving animal inspired prints and neutral color palettes this fall. Paired with our new Chain Collection or Classic Bee Collection, there are so many ways to style your Broadmoor ensembles.

settings.content:
Can't you just feel the mountain air already? Fall is the perfect time to explore the grounds, with changing leaves and perfect golf weather. The only part of this getaway that may be difficult is picking out the perfect accessories! Upon your return to daily life, any Susan Shaw pieces you may take home will serve as a reminder of memories made at The Broadmoor. 

Safe travels!
